scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix Backend" "npm run start --prefix ui"
scripts.stop: lsof -ti:3000,3001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null && echo '✅ Servers stopped successfully' || echo 'ℹ️ No servers running on ports 3000/3001'
scripts.stop:force: pkill -f 'npm run start' && pkill -f 'npm run dev' && pkill -f 'concurrently' && echo '✅ All npm processes stopped'
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix Backend && npm install --prefix ui
